    Reference

    All functions

    assoc_tibble()

    A generic function to create a data structure for every variable pair in a dataset

    calc_assoc()

    Calculates association or conditional association measures for a dataset

    calc_assoc_all()

    Calculates multiple association measures

    default_assoc()

    Default association measures calculated using calc_assoc

    matrix_assoc()

    A generic function to create a symmetric matrix from a tibble of association measures with different classes

    measures

    Association measure functions available in the package

    order_assoc_lollipop()

    Ordering lollipops for the lollipop plot

    order_assoc_var()

    Ordering variables for matrix layout

    plot_assoc_linear()

    Pairwise plot in a linear layout

    plot_assoc_matrix()

    Pairwise plot in a matrix layout

    show_assoc()

    Association plot for a variable pair with or without a conditioning variable

    sym_assoc()

    A tibble structure for a symmetric association matrix

    tbl_ace()

    Alternating conditional expectations correlation

    tbl_cancor()

    Canonical correlation

    tbl_chi()

    Pearson's Contingency Coefficient

    tbl_cor()

    Pearson, Spearman or Kendall correlation

    tbl_dcor()

    Distance correlation

    tbl_gkGamma()

    Goodman Kruskal's Gamma

    tbl_gkTau()

    Goodman Kruskal's Tau

    tbl_mine()

    MINE family measures

    tbl_nmi()

    Normalized mutual information

    tbl_polycor()

    Polychoric correlation

    tbl_scag()

    Graph-theoretic scagnostics measures

    tbl_tau()

    Kendall's tau A, B, C and Kendall's W

    tbl_uncertainty()

    Uncertainty coefficient

    update_assoc()

    A user friendly function for changing association measures
